name: To Appoint a Lord
description:
You are tasked with becoming Supreme Lord of the Universe in 10 days.  You must listen to your people and make decisions that will put you in favor with them- after all, how can you rule if your subjects hate you?

--

Made in 7 days for our 'appoint' jam. As per the challenge given by a fan, on the credits page, we have our 6+ contributions, 3 of which are the major contributors. (Those 3 are bolded.)
